Detailed Description

A special cell that represents the environment in which the colony of cells live.

It can contain chemical species and reactions, like a normal CellBase object and cannot divide.

Member Function Documentation

double Milieu::getTimeDependentVolume ( const double  time  )  const [virtual]

We reimplement the method in order to return a value of the milieu volume independent of time and dependent only on the number of cells (volume0).

This is an approximation since we should take into account the volume of all the other cells in order to calculate the volume of the milieu. However, as the volume of the milieu is much larger than the volume of one cell, there is not much difference.

Implements CellBase.
